Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 36th overall pick, by Ashburn in 1979...
Earned first career win on 4/9/1984...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/14/1987, off Dennis Thompson (PON)...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1987...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Syracuse on 6/8/1988, striking out 10...
Signed as a free agent by Longport on 2/13/1990 to a 3-year deal worth $750,000 per year...
Injured on 6/9/1990 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1991, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Signed as a free agent by Halifax on 2/8/1993 to a 3-year deal worth $896,400 per year...
